timeline.message: [DOCS] Amends all transforms API docs pages.

timeline.bodyText: Strictly speaking, you only need the manage_transform cluster privilege, which is included in the built-in transform_admin role. Maybe it would better to only include  manage_transform in the bulleted list, and then follow with the sentence 'The built-in transform_admin role has this privilege'. as before? Same applies to the other pages below.
timeline.author: peteharverson
